basics.name: Eloi Navarro
basics.label: Senior Android Engineer
basics.summary: I'm Eloi Navarro, a different kind of android engineer focused on building practical and useful experiences

work.name: Bynder
work.summary: Refactor the app from scratch to use Jetpack Compose, expanding on existing functionality and using new tools to provide new ways to use mobile unique capabilities.
highlights: Changed the app navigation structure adding a «Home» screen providing user-relevant access to recent content.
responsibilities: Collaborated with backend developers to design and implement features using existing API.
Brainstorm and collaborate with product in producing new features to get more well rounded user experiences.
Participated in code reviews and contributed to improving coding standards within the team.
achievements: Developing and maintaining web applications using JavaScript, HTML, and CSS. Collaborating with the team to implement new features and fix bugs.

work.name: Bynder
work.summary: Maintain and develop new features for the android app of the company. Refactor old java codebase to kotlin.
highlights: Poposed an added new functionality to the app that was later adopted by both teams (iOS and Android) as a core feature.
responsibilities: Developed and maintained backend services using Python and Django.
Worked closely with front-end developers to integrate user-facing elements with server-side logic.
Participated in daily stand-ups and bi-weekly sprint planning meetings to ensure alignment with project goals.
achievements: Successfully transitioned from Java to Kotlin and from OAuth1 to OAuth2 in the process.

work.name: Ubisoft
work.summary: Assisted in expanding and updating in-house library tailor-made for several games' needs. Gained hands-on experience with C#, iOS and Unity3D.
achievements: Upgraded event logging system reducing error rate in tracking events to less than 1%

work.name: Softonic
work.summary: I join to be part of the mobile team, working in a multidisciplinary environment. Making use of agile and lean methodologies.

work.name: W3IS2 S.L.
work.summary: Main android developer, assuming more and more responsibility in projects and to undertake UX tasks such as wireframes or prototypes. Responsible for high level project definition, choosing specific technology. Working closely with the UI and UX designer. Self-demanding worker and always with the best quality as the only acceptable outcome.

education.area: Usability, interaction design and user experience

projects.name: Smart Beaches
projects.description: A proof of concept app to showcase smart features centered around private beach services.
highlights: Built in record time of two months ready for Fitur 2012
Close collaboration with design to provide a suitable solution
